overview: Innocence Lost... Once again I have returned with more pretty young creatures to make your juice flow. I'm always AMAZED to see how these sweet, pretty, young girls can transform into such horny, sex starved animals that can't stop themselves when the right buttons are pushed! These girls are truly first timers (some you'll never see again) who are making their erotic debut here! Pandora returns to fulfill a fantasy. Her first D.P.!!! The rest of these girls are not to be missed!!! I love women!
title: Filthy First Timers 2
